login.like4like_cookies: Please enter your Like4Like Cookies, make sure you are logged in with the correct account!
login.cookies_expired: Your Facebook cookies have expired, please get new cookies!

actions.enter_profile_link: Please enter Facebook Profile link, make sure the account has a Follow button!
actions.enter_credits: Please enter credits to use (2-21), enter just one value, example: 15
actions.processing_exchange: Processing exchange to followers, make sure you have more than 50 credits for server processing!
actions.enter_delay: Please enter Follow mission delay, recommended to use above 60 seconds!
actions.running_mission: Running Follow mission, use CTRL + C if stuck and CTRL + Z to stop!
actions.removing_links: Removing/Archiving all connected links in your account!
actions.links_removed: All connected links have been removed or archived from your account!
actions.enter_fanpage_link: Please enter Facebook Fanpage link, make sure it has a Follow button!
actions.invalid_option: The option you entered is not available!
actions.deleting_data: Deleting your account data, please wait...

errors.facebook_link_used: Facebook link is already used by another user, please use previous Like4Like account!
errors.cannot_exchange_credits: Cannot exchange credits for followers, please try manual exchange!
